definition: to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell

sentences.english: I will use some of the money to buy a drum set and have a cool pool.
sentences.chinese: 我会将一部分的钱买架子鼓还会弄一个漂亮的游泳池。

sentences.english: I had wanted to play the clarinet, flute or drums.
sentences.chinese: 有很多选择，前面我想吹黑管，长笛和打架子鼓。

sentences.english: Don't ②lay into your drum kit at midnight in a residential area.
sentences.chinese: 午夜时分，不要在居民区敲打你的架子鼓。

sentences.english: Where Hefei learning frame is bulging Well ! ?
sentences.chinese: 合肥哪里学架子鼓好啊？

definition: zither or guzheng/large zither with 13 to 25 strings, developed from guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] during Tang and Song times
